name: Tangiers - Stealth driven by dark 20th century avant-garde.
blurb: Tangiers - Stealth gameplay meets the darker avant-garde of the 20th century.

rewards.reward: A big thank you for helping support the development of Tangiers! \r\nThe names of all our backers will form a large framed picture holding pride of place on our office wall!
Limited early bird tier. Same as the \u00a310 tier. A little discount as a thank you for putting your trust in us early on.
Bare bones tier. \r\nDRM-free copy of the game and all future updates and expansions.\r\n[Includes previous Tier]

Get a look into the creative process behind Tangiers with a PDF download of our art book. A beautifully presented collage of concept art, write-ups and behind the scenes shots.\r\nIncludes the previous tier!

Full downloadable package - as well as the game and the art book, this tier includes a 320kbs download of the full soundtrack.\r\nAll supporters of this tier and above will gain access to a backers only message board.

On top of all previous tiers, this one includes beta access and download access to a three weekly behind the scenes documentary.\r\nBeta access will come in the form of a stand-alone prequel exclusively distributed to backers who support this tier and above. See the Rewards section of the main text for more information!
T-Shirt tier! \r\nThis tier is pretty self explanatory - all previous tiers, plus a T-shirt!

Physical tier.
With this tier, on release we'll send out a physical copy of the game. 
We'll also include your name in the end credits of the game. 
Backers receive all previous tiers.
Soundtrack tier. \r\nAlongside the physical copy of the game, we'll include a separate two-disk edit of the game's soundtrack on CD.\r\nAlso comes with a Tangiers poster and a pair of button badges.

Everything above, as well as a 55 page, high quality copy of the Tangiers Art-book. (see the \u00a315 tier for details). \r\nAll backers receiving the Tangiers Art-book will have their name (unless you don't want us to!) illustrated in an introductory page.

Collectors physical edition.
This tier includes all the physical rewards (T-shirt, Game, Soundtrack, Art-book). 
Rather than put the disks in a standard dvd-case and cd jewel case, you'll get them in a pair of beautiful, full-art and textured card Digipaks. 
The game, and soundtrack will come in a hand decorated and numbered wooden display box. Inside will be a hand-written letter of thanks, a Tangiers poster and a variety of hand-made trinkets and curiosities!
This tier does, of course, include all the downloadable extras.

In addition to the previous tier, we'll get in contact and work with you to design a personalized monument. \r\nThese objects dot the landscape - often strange, often out-of place relics of a bygone age and reality. The scope in designing these is endless - we'll build from sketches, photographs or just ideas!\r\nNOTE! For this reward and those above, the final design is at our discretion  - just in case somebody tries to get something particularly offensive or degrading in the game!
Following the previous tier, we'll also design one of the non-player characters in the game-world around your ideas and specifications!

With this tier, we'll set out to design the environment that the character is found in. This location will be found in the outskirts of one of the main urban areas - perhaps a small crop of slums, a filling station... whatever it is, that's up to you!

Continuing the previous tiers, around the midpoint of development, the Andalusian team will set up a Skype conference with you. During this, we'll discuss and plan out a side-narrative based around the previous two designs.

"In Association with" tier.\r\nEach time the game is started up, before all the developer splash screens come up, we'll put up a splash for either your company or for you, personally (or loved one). \r\nWe've got three spaces for these... if we do get multiple bidders, they'll appear in the order that the bids are placed! (Though if anyone backs with the above tier, their splash will come first of all)

One off, limited edition tier.

As a thank you for playing a massive part in getting Tangiers off the ground, we're working with Studio-Boo to create a one off, hand made mask based upon an interpretation of the player character. Studio Boo is a London based design partnership whose members have been previously commissioned by a number of high-profile clients.
As further thanks for your contribution, we'll deliver this reward to you in person, anywhere in the UK - and take you to dinner at a mutually agreed upon restaurant local to you!

This tier will include all previous tiers (Your splash from the previous tier will be first to appear), and, being entirely indebted to your support, you'll get a free copy of anything Andalusian produces, ever!

N.B - This tier will be initially open to UK backers - if you gift us with an improbable level of enthusiasm and want us to fly out, contact us to discuss :)
